# pixelFormat(_:)

**Type Method**

Creates a tag containing pixel format information.

## Declaration

```swift
static func pixelFormat(_ value: OSType) -> CMTypedTag<OSType>
```

## Parameters

- **value**: The pixel format for this tag. Use a constant from the framework that renders video content. For example, rendering to a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreVideo/cvpixelbuffer-q2e] should use a constant from [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreVideo/pixel-format-identifiers].

## Return Value

A new typed tag containing the pixel format represented by `value`.

## Creating Tags

- **channelID(_:)**: Creates a new channel ID tag from an integer.
- **mediaSubType(_:)**: Creates a tag containing media subtype metadata.
- **mediaType(_:)**: Creates a tag containing media type metadata.
- **packingType(_:)**: Creates a tag containing frame-packing information.
- **projectionType(_:)**: Creates a tag containing projection surface information.
- **stereoView(_:)**: Creates a tag containing eye information for 3D video.
- **stereoViewInterpretation(_:)**: Creates a tag containing information on how to interpret stereo view metadata.
- **trackID(_:)**: Creates a tag containing a track ID.
- **videoLayerID(_:)**: Creates a tag containing a video layer ID.
- **init(rawCategory:rawTagValue:)**: Creates a new tag from a category and value.
